review:
I have been using this phone for the last 8 months. Here's the review  
Pros:  
Dual sim slot with additional memory card slot - big wow...i till date have
not been able to understand why the so called advanced versions come with
alternate second sim slot cause one needs extra memory given the kind of junk
we put in our phones needs more memory.  
Removable battery - another wow..i have an A8 as well and its known fact that
after a year battery trouble starts..with non removable battery phones its
impossible to get battery replaced unless you visit authorised dealer and
guess what they have said it takes 3 months or more to get the battery
replaced for A8.  
Software upgradable version - well this was a surprise...i didnt know this
model comes in two variants..one with and one without auto software upgradable
mode...luckily mine is auto so i get best of the upgrades  
Batery backup & charging time - battery lasts about 2 days with medium usage
without gaming...which for me is good...charging time with original charger
for fully disposed battery is 2.5 hours...which is fantastic...however i
haven't got the same result using other chargers  
Cons:  
Weight - this is a heavy phone given the hardware is 2 years old  
Look & feel - basic look with no jaz...full plastic finish...so no where close
to the sophisticated metal finished models  
Screen & display - screen is ok with ok resolution display...once again in
comparison to 30k plus models  
Overall-for someone using a phone for the purpose of it with being on track
with most of utility apps without lag or hanging issues..this comes as the
cheapest option with the punch of performance. I bought a total of 4 phones
for the family and haven't heard anyone complain so far

review:
Guys,  
Before you order Galaxy J7 Next you must know,  
.  
1, Its not a FULL HD screen. Only a HD screen with 267ppi  
.  
2, Only 2 GB RAM. Optimum ram for Android Nougat is 3 GB. This is among the
only few mobiles above 11,000 price without full HD & 3 GB RAM.  
Even Galaxy J7 prime they are selling at 11,000 rupees has both those
features.  
.  
3, Only 3000mah battery & weighs 168gm. (Galaxy J7 prime selling at lower
price has 3300mah battery & weighs only 168gm ).  
.  
4, No FINGER PRINT sensor. Please point me another new mobile above 11,000
rupees without this.  
.  
5, No ambient light sensor, No compass sensor, No gyroscope sensor.  
.  
6, Thick bezels on all sides. ( Screen to body ratio is only 69% )  
.  
7, Only 16 GB internal memory.  
.  
8, No dual 4G. Its only 4G plus 3G.  
.  
9, Up to 256 GB expandable via microSD ( Nobody in sense mind will do it, as
the cost of 256 GB is above 9000 rupees )  
.  
Not to mention about the front camera without autofocus & with a large f 2.2
aperture  
.  
Finally do tick the " Helpful " option below so people will be aware before
buying this  
.  
Thank You.  
  
.

Samsung best smart phones

J7 nxt is good phone in 11490 price. Some hitting problem when charging.
Camera is super you can compare to other phone like vivo, oppo etc.No hanging
no lagging and running very smoothly.

Best smartphone ever. If you have passion of photographie n gaming or anything
you should go for it guys. Below are some features n brief detail .  
  
Brief descripiton :- Feast your eyes on the new Galaxy J7Nxt. Its large
13.95cm (5.5”) HD sAMOLED display turns viewing into a memorable experience
with incredible detail and true colours.J7 Nxt is flawlessly crafted with a
unified colour scheme to get you all the attention. And the elegant patterned
back makes it a sheer delight to hold.Downloading, gaming, Seamless multi-
tasking– do what you love like a pro with its advanced Octa-Core processor and
2GB RAM. With the latest OS- Android Nougat, everything feels extremely
seamless. From multi -window support to all new Emojis and directly replying
to notifications; it’s a delightful experience.The powerful front & rear
cameras come with LED flash and a rear F 1.9 aperture lens, so it’s never too
dark to click a brilliant shot.  
  
Features & details:-  
13MP primary camera with FHD recording at 30fps, f1.9 main camera with flash
and autofocus and 5MP front facing camera  
13.97 centimeters (5.5-inch) Super AMOLED capacitive touchscreen with 720 x
1280 pixels resolution and 16M color support  
Android v7.0 Nougat operating system with 1.6GHz Cortex A53 Exynos 7870 quad
core processor, 2GB RAM, 16GB internal memory expandable up to 256GB and dual
SIM (micro+micro) dual-standby (4G+3G)  
3000mAH lithium-ion battery providing talk-time of 21 hours  
1 year manufacturer warranty for device and 6 months manufacturer warranty for
in-box accessories including batteries from the date of purchase.

review:
Great price for an AmoLED screen.. 720p screen (not 1080p) but excellent 5.5"
super bright! 16 gb flash sufficient for my needs...Processor is speedy and
great power save modes keep battery working for long time..No heating issues
seen by me.. Phone's built-in earpiece volume is not loud, so bit difficult if
you are hard of hearing. Music speaker at rear is decently loud and
sufficient. 4G and wifi works solid. VoLTE works great for Airtel for me..
excellent value..
